products.info:
Flying
{2}: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it into your graveyard. If you do, Scion of the Ur-Dragon becomes a copy of that card until end of turn. Then shuffle.
products.text:
Flying
{2}: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it into your graveyard. If you do, Scion of the Ur-Dragon becomes a copy of that card until end of turn. Then shuffle.
products.flavor: "I am the blood of the ur-dragon, coursing through all dragonkind."

rulings.text: Removing the other Dragon card from your graveyard has no effect on Scion of the Ur-Dragon.
When Scion of the Ur-Dragon becomes a copy of another Dragon, it loses its copy ability for the rest of the turn.

foreignNames.name: Spross des Ur-Drachen
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
{2}: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer bleibenden Drache-Karte und lege sie auf deinen Friedhof. Falls du dies tust, wird der Spross des Ur-Drachen bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer Kopie jener Karte. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich bin vom Blut des Ur-Drachen, das durch alle Drachen fließt."

foreignNames.name: Vástago del ur-dragón
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
{2}: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de permanente Dragón y ponla en tu cementerio. Si lo haces, el Vástago del ur-dragón se convierte en una copia de esa carta hasta el final del turno. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: "Yo soy la sangre del ur-dragón, que corre en todos los dragones".

foreignNames.name: Scion de l'Ur-Dragon
foreignNames.text:
Vol
{2} : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de permanent Dragon et mettez-la dans votre cimetière. Si vous faites ainsi, le Scion de l'Ur-Dragon devient une copie de cette carte jusqu'à la fin du tour. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je suis le sang de l'Ur-Dragon qui coule dans les veines de tous les dragons. »

foreignNames.name: Discendente dell'Ur-Drago
foreignNames.text:
Volare
{2}: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta permanente Drago e mettila nel tuo cimitero. Se lo fai, il Discendente dell'Ur-Drago diventa una copia di quella carta fino alla fine del turno. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sono sangue del sangue dell'ur-drago, che scorre nelle vene di tutti i draghi."

foreignNames.name: 始祖ドラゴンの末裔
foreignNames.text:
飛行
{2}：あなたのライブラリーからドラゴン・パーマネント・カード１枚を探し、それをあなたの墓地に置く。そうしたなら、ターン終了時まで、始祖ドラゴンの末裔はそのカードのコピーになる。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ドラゴン・アバター
foreignNames.flavor: 「我こそは、すべてのドラゴンを流れる始祖ドラゴンの血なり。」

foreignNames.name: Herdeiro do Ur-dragão
foreignNames.text:
Voar
{2}: Procure um card de permanente do tipo Dragão em seu grimório e coloque-o no seu cemitério. Se fizer isso, Herdeiro do Ur-dragão torna-se uma cópia daquele card até o final do turno. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu sou o sangue do ur-dragão, que escorre pelas veias de todos os dragões."

products.name: Beacon of Immortality
products.info: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.
products.text: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.
products.flavor: The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.

rulings.text: If you double a negative life total, you do the real math. A life total of -10 becomes -20.
Beacon of Immortality’s effect counts as life gain (or life loss, if the life total was negative) for effects that trigger on or replace life gain (or life loss).
If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.
